meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bright.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with a warm brightness from the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The brightness of the stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The brightness of the idea struck him like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room with a brightness that was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The brightness of the fireflies in the garden created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The intensity of light or color.
meanings.sent1: The brightness of the sun made her squint.
meanings.sent2: The painting stood out with its vibrant brightness.
meanings.sent3: The brightness of the neon sign was almost blinding at night.
meanings.sent4: The brightness of the rainbow after the rain brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The brightness of the fireworks lit up the dark sky in celebration.

meanings.definition: The quality of being intelligent or clever.
meanings.sent1: Her brightness in solving puzzles amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The brightness of his ideas led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The brightness of her wit always kept the conversation lively.
meanings.sent4: His brightness in strategic planning was evident in the success of the project.
meanings.sent5: The brightness of her mind shone through in her academic achievements.
